charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1101_0100:
While doing some special training,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] stopped by a cave
and heard someone’s voice...
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_0300:
No... That was too wild. I need to make it sound
a bit more intelligent.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_0500:
Yep, just like I thought—the “Muhahaha!” works
better than the “Wahahaha!”
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_0401_0700: Urk! You weren’t supposed to see that!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_0402_0900: Gah! Oh, it’s you? You surprised me!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_1000:
Well, you saw everything, so I may as
well explain.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_1100:
Next to the real Giovanni, it’s easy to spot the
flaws in my impersonation. So, I was working on
my technique.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_1200:
In the Johto region, I had no trouble fooling
Trainers who didn’t know much about Giovanni...
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_1300: but the real Giovanni is here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_0401_1600:
Hmph! You may be good at Pokémon battles, but
you think like a little kid!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_0302_1700:
So...you probably don’t need the
disguise anymore, right?
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_0402_1800:
Haha! I guess a little kid like you just
can’t understand!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_1900:
I could act as a decoy for the boss, for example,
and fool our enemies… There are lots of options.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2000:
Pretending to be someone else opens up endless
possibilities for evil schemes!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2100:
I could pretend to be you, for instance, and steal
your friends’ Pokémon! And other stuff like that!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2200: Gwahahaha! Hey, don’t look so scared, OK?
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2300:
If I really wanted to do that, I wouldn’t be
telling YOU!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2400:
After all, I’m the brains behind Team Rocket! When
it comes to evil scheming, I’m second to none!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2500:
Weezing is the perfect partner for a crafty guy
like me.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2600:
When Weezing runs away from its enemies, it uses
its toxic gases to confuse them!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2700:
That’s the cue for my Honchkrow to have his
Murkrow cronies distract the enemy!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2800:
Both Weezing and Honchkrow are veeeery
useful Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_2900:
Anyway, what I’m saying is that there’s no need
to do Pokémon battles all “fair and square.”
There are tons of dirty tricks a person can use!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_3000:
I wonder—would a little kid like you stand a
chance against me?
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_3100:
Heheh... That look in your eyes right now...that’s
good. You look just like that kid who busted into
the radio tower that one time!
charaepi_ch0143_00_lambda/2301_1201_3200:
I’m looking forward to seeing what you’re capable
of down the road!
